item.title: I don't know the valueerror
item.description: raise ValueError('Unable to configure handler ' ValueError: Unable to configure handler’mail_admins’ How can I fix this error?

item.title: [Udemy Python 3 introduction + application] 22. Tuple unpacking
item.description: **This article is from Udemy “Introducing Python3 + application + application + Silicon Valley style code styles in the US taught by active Silicon Valley engineers” This is a notebook for yourself after taking the course. It is open to the public after obtaining permission from the lecturer Jun Sakai. ** ■ Tuple unpacking ◆ Break tuples num_tuple = (10, 20) print(num_tuple) x, y = num_tuple print('x =', x, type(x)) print('y =', y, type(y)) (10, 20) x = 10 <class'int'> y = 20 <class'int'> Elements of tuples can be separated.
